title: 377. Andy, Dave Smith & DJ CTI: ... Part 1
itunes:title: 377. Andy, Dave Smith & DJ CTI: ... Part 1
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ are joined in the studio by Comedian and Libertarian Dave Smith. They discuss the intentional division forced upon us by the world's elites, how the evolution of communication through social media has created more chaos in our societies, and what individual Americans can do to combat these issues.
